scripts.compile-scss: npm rebuild node-sass && node-sass --include-path scss src/assets/scss/main.scss build/assets/main.css
scripts.build:css: npm run compile-scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:html: node node_modules/htmlcat/htmlcat.js --in src/index.html --out build/index.html && node node_modules/htmlcat/htmlcat.js --in src/404.html --out build/404.html
scripts.build:all: npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:vendor
scripts.watch:all: parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:html'
scripts.preinstall: npm install bower && npm install cpx && node 'npm-scripts/build-structure.js' && bower install
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:all && npm run minify
